description: Configuration file specifying which endpoints to generate tests for

endpoints._comment: Set enabled to false to skip test generation for this endpoint
Path parameters should be included in curly braces {paramName}
Example of disabled endpoint - no tests will be generated

fields.generateForAllEndpoints: Boolean - Set to true to generate tests for all endpoints in swagger.json, false to use only endpoints listed below
fields.method: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, etc.)
fields.path: API endpoint path as defined in swagger.json. Use {paramName} for path parameters
fields.controller: Name of the controller handling this endpoint (used for organization)
fields.enabled: Boolean - Set to true to generate tests for this endpoint, false to skip

_instructions.usage: Copy this file to endpoint-config.json and customize the endpoints array with your API endpoints
